definition: name of a person on the household register (old)/name on a roster/professional name of a prostitute/pseudonym/nickname
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: The child can name all the flowers in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子能说出花园里一切的花名。

sentences.english: And it’s a fairly safe bet that the roster will grow even longer this year.
sentences.chinese: 我敢打赌，今年俱乐部的花名册将会变得更长。

sentences.english: I think I shall have to invent some more for Sam's garden at the end.
sentences.chinese: 我想最后我得为Sam的花园创造出更多的花名来。

sentences.english: She mentioned all the flowers in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 她举出花园所有的花名。

sentences.english: So the school cut off his name from the students' roster.
sentences.chinese: 于是学校将他的名字从学生的花名程。

sentences.english: A identify: Can you name these flowers?
sentences.chinese: 你能说得出这些花名吗？
你能说得出这些花名吗？

sentences.english: His name is Zhong Yong, which is recorded on the registration book.
sentences.chinese: 他的花名叫张永，这是记载在花名册上的。

definition: pet name for a child/childhood name
cuckoo (Cercococcyx spp., also written 杜鵑鳥|杜鹃鸟)/Indian azalea (Rhododendron simsii Planch, also written 杜鵑花|杜鹃花)
stage name (of an actor or actress)
narcissus/daffodil/legendary aquatic immortal/refers to those buried at sea/person who wanders abroad and does not return
